data.actual_result: You can delete the server without entering the server name.
data.expected_result: It should ask you to enter the server name that is saved, not the unsaved one.
data.short_description: You can delete your server without entering the server name for confirmation
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to your server settings - Remove the server name, don't click save. - Click Delete Server - The confirmation box will pop up asking you to type the server name. You don't have to type anything though and can click Delete Server because you removed the name.
